Class PolynomialRootApproximation

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.fi.muni.polynomialroots.PolynomialRootApproximation

extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing root approximation methods
    Author:
    Adrian E.

      PolynomialRootApproximation() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.math.BigDecimal bisection(Polynomial p, java.math.BigDecimal a, java.math.BigDecimal b, java.math.BigDecimal eps)
      Bisection algorithm, finds one root within interval
      static javafx.util.Pair<java.math.BigDecimal,java.lang.Boolean> findRootHalleyInInterval(Polynomial p, java.math.BigDecimal precision, java.math.BigDecimal begin, java.math.BigDecimal end, boolean needsToBeInside)
      Approximate a root using Halleys method using (begin+end)/2 as starting point. if during computation this method jumps out of this interval, return as fail
      static javafx.util.Pair<java.math.BigDecimal,java.lang.Boolean> findRootNewtonInInterval(Polynomial p, java.math.BigDecimal precision, java.math.BigDecimal begin, java.math.BigDecimal end, boolean needsToBeInside)
      Approximate a root using Newtons method using (begin+end)/2 as starting point. if during computation this method jumps out of this interval, depending on needsToBeInside may return fail

    • Method Detail

      • bisection

        public static java.math.BigDecimal bisection(Polynomial p,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal a,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal b,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal eps)
        Bisection algorithm, finds one root within interval
        Parameters:
        p - polynomial to find root of
        a - start of interval
        b - end of interval
        eps - allowed error of precision
        Returns:
        root of p with allowed error eps

      • findRootNewtonInInterval

        public static javafx.util.Pair<java.math.BigDecimal,java.lang.Boolean> findRootNewtonInInterval(Polynomial p,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal precision,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal begin,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal end,
                                                                                                boolean needsToBeInside)
        Approximate a root using Newtons method using (begin+end)/2 as starting point. if during computation this method jumps out of this interval, depending on needsToBeInside may return fail
        Parameters:
        p - polynomial to search root in
        precision - allowed precision error
        begin - start of interval
        end - end of interval
        needsToBeInside - true if root needs to be inside interval
        Returns:
        Pair of root of p within [a,b] and bool indicating success or failure

      • findRootHalleyInInterval

        public static javafx.util.Pair<java.math.BigDecimal,java.lang.Boolean> findRootHalleyInInterval(Polynomial p,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal precision,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal begin,
                                                                                                java.math.BigDecimal end,
                                                                                                boolean needsToBeInside)
        Approximate a root using Halleys method using (begin+end)/2 as starting point. if during computation this method jumps out of this interval, return as fail
        Parameters:
        p - polynomial to search root in
        precision - allowed precision error
        begin - start of interval
        end - end of interval
        needsToBeInside - true if root needs to be inside interval
        Returns:
        Pair of root of p within [a,b] and bool indicating success or failure
